text: Ek saban gopnyan ngon awak salah Amai jih nyang brok jiyakin got that Saba jikheun got le chetan colah Soe nyang hâ€˜eut Tuhan sit Neupeusisat Soe nyang Neuhajat Neubri hidayah Teuma bek gata takeumeung poh droe Sabab that seungkoe ate teuh susah Sabab awaknyan han jimeuiman Teuma di Tuhan Neuteupue sudah Peue nyang jipeugot bandum Neuteupue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah
